mapper.insert: insert into `discuss_post` (discuss_post_id, user_id, school_code, title, content) values (#{discussPostId}, #{userId}, #{schoolCode}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: update `discuss_post` set is_deleted = 1 where discuss_post_id = #{postId} and is_deleted = 0
mapper.select: select id, discuss_post_id, user_id, title, content, like_count, forward_count, comment_count, type, status, create_time, update_time from `discuss_post` where discuss_post_id = #{postId} and is_deleted = 0

select id, discuss_post_id, user_id, school_code, title, content, like_count, forward_count, comment_count, type, status, create_time, update_time from `discuss_post` where is_deleted = 0 order by update_time DESC limit #{limit}
select image_id from `post_image` where post_id = #{postId} and is_deleted = 0 limit 1
